content: Hello everyone!  We are excited to start our third weekly competition and would like to introduce Survivor game  . The prize pool will be $50 equivalent of BTC to be credited to one or more lucky winners account after the conclusion of Game 5.The tournament this week is simple. I will post 5 games below. All you have to do is decide the result of each game and post it here. So for each Game you need to choose either a Home Win (1), a Draw (X), or an Away Win (2). If you make it to the end of Game 5, you win. You will win either the full prizepool, or shared with however many winners there are. If nobody wins, the prize pool rolls over to the next week.For speed, an example selection for the 5 games could be: 1X221good luck !  IMPORTANT - Entries close 1 hour before Game 1 starts.(All fixture times for GMT +1)Game 1 - Wednesday, 12th April @ 20:00, Real Madrid v Chelsea (Champions League)Game 2 - Thursday 13th April @ 20:00, Manchester United v Sevilla (Europa League)Game 3 - Friday 14th April @ Middlesborough v Norwich (English Championship) Game 4 - Saturday 15th April @ 12:30, Aston Villa v Newcastle (Premier League) Game 5 - Sunday 16th April @ 14:00, West Ham v Arsenal (Premier League)Game rules & eligibility Must have 20 minimum Bitcointalk forum posts for your entry to be eligiblePick either Home (1), Draw (X), or Away (2) for each gameMust be remaining after Game 5 to win.If multiple winners, prize split between all winnersIf no winners, prize pool rolls over to the next weekIn the event that a game is cancelled/void, all players still in the tournament will progress to the next Game.All management decisions are final, collusion / cheating will not be tolerated
